about_the_game:
The Story

The Queen’s evergrowing talking sword is lost in a faraway land. Luckily, you showed up to wield it back to the castle.
You do know how to swing a sword, right? RIGHT?!


Slash Quest puts you in the shoes of Shepherd, an unlikely knight with a big heart, wielding an even bigger weapon — Swordie! — and absolutely zero skills. Together, they must journey through exotic lands, battling nasty creatures, solving puzzles, and making lovely friends along the way to reunite Swordie (the royal talking sword) with its rightful owner, the Queen.




Get ready to slice and dice with simple yet unconventional controls where the sword controls the hero and not the other way around. Slash Quest introduces unique gameplay mechanics where Swordie grows bigger with every enemy it slays, shaping your journey through puzzles, battles, and beyond.




Express your style with over 50 collectable cosmetic items for Shep and Swordie — after all, a royal weapon must also be stylish! From a heroic look to a baby shark costume, the customization options let you tailor every quest to your unique taste.




With 16 unique levels to explore, Slash Quest offers a buffet of adventures ranging from puzzle-solving to epic boss battles. Customize your gameplay with 12 upgradable skills and power-ups as you rescue vibrant characters, extending the adventure to new environments and lands.




Compete on integrated leaderboards, participate in seasonal events with time-limited rewards, and enjoy mini-games that add depth and replayability to your quest!

Features:

  • Unique growing weapon mechanic where the real hero is the Sword(ie)
  • A charming storyline filled with humor, vibrant art, and memorable characters
  • 16 Unique levels to explore
  • Challenge friends and foes on integrated leaderboards
  • Unique Boss fights
  • 12 upgradable skills and power-ups to customize your gameplay experience
  • 8 Lovely characters to rescue
  • Dozens of side quests and mini-games
  • 50+ Collectable cosmetic items (for Swordie and Shep!)
  • Replayability with seasonal events featuring time-limited challenges and rewards
  • Localized in 14 languages (Brazilian Portuguese, English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Arabic, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, and Simplified and Traditional Chinese)
  • Original soundtrack by Breakmaster Cylinder (Aegis Defenders and Secrets of Grindea)
